title: Kasumin’s Perfect Plan : Day 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Hmm~, Kasumin’s luck is so good that it’s such a problem~.... Huh? What’s this.… A spell to make your wish come true? Kufufu, it’s a perfect spell while Kasumin is strongest♪ Kasumin can easily do it too, let’s try it right away~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Sorry for the wait, Kasukasu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s not Kasukasu, it’s Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah, yeah, it’s cute either way!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>If it’s cute either way then please call me Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Sorry for the wait you two<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It’s not fair to have a fun conversation by yourselves~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That’s right. Today should be a fun day for everyone, after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, everyone is here. Okay, let’s go to the karaoke place~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yay! 97 points!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You’re amazing, You-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Well well Ayumu-chan, just watch me. I’ll surpass You-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Honoka is brimming with confidence! Ai is getting excited too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Kasumi-chan, have you queued a song?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, Kasumin queued it just now! Anyway, hey everyone, would you like a cough drop so you can sing longer? Kasumin bought some lemon cough drop earlier~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Waah, thank you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai wants one too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Okay, okay, everyone please take one at a time~. It’s very very good for your throat, so make sure to lick it properly, okay~ Kufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hnn….! Ka-, Kasumi-cha-…. This cough drop is sour~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I-, it really is…. Hnn--!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai’s face is squeezing together~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>….But it seems to work-! Alright, it’s time to sing---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh? Huh? Honoka-senpai, are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m fine, I’m fine~! If I can sing more with this, I don’t mind taking even 10 more of it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Huuh? That’s weird, it says “So sour that you’ll faint” on the package…. Maybe it isn’t that sour? *Munch*….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Phew…. Only the outside part is sour. The middle is sweet and deli-.... Eh? Kasumi-chan? Kasumi-chaaaan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
